availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Andrew J. Wyatt (Christian County, Kentucky, teacher.)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, schoolteacher. Kentucky native. Son of Richard Wyatt and Martha Harrellson Wyatt. Married to Sarah A. Dryden Wyatt in Christian County, Kentucky, on December 24, 1850. Father of Agnes Wyatt, Nannie Wyatt, Susan Wyatt, and Walter Wyatt. Schoolteacher in Christian County in 1850. Schoolteacher in Christian County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District 2, p. 426B
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, p. 785.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 4817.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Christian County Marriages, Film 001942963.
"Andrew J. Wyatt (1828-1915)," Find A Grave, Memorial 84491196, accessed July 15, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/84491196/andrew-j-wyatt.
